examples.example: 中国有十几亿人口，大家共同努力创造着美好的未来。

translate.english: China has more than a billion people, and everyone is working together to create a beautiful future.

examples.example: 中国拥有十四亿勤劳勇敢的人民，他们共同为实现中华民族伟大复兴的中国梦而努力奋斗着。

translate.english: China has 1.4 billion hardworking and brave people, who are all working hard together to realize the Chinese Dream of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.

examples.example: 地球上有几十亿人，大家都在各自的领域努力生活着。

translate.english: There are billions of people on the earth, and everyone is striving to live in their respective fields.
